definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中醫和印度草藥醫學裏的藥用歷史悠久。

sentences.english: The history of Liuyang fireworks dates back to the year 1740.
sentences.chinese: 瀏陽花炮創制於1740年，生產歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Shanghai classical garden enjoys a long history and has achieved great accomplishment in gardening art.
sentences.chinese: 上海園林歷史悠久，在造園藝術上取得了很高成就。

sentences.english: Daye, it has a long history and goes back.
sentences.chinese: 大冶，歷史悠久，淵遠流長。

sentences.english: Yueqing has a long history, human and cultural resources.
sentences.chinese: 樂清歷史悠久，人文薈萃。

sentences.english: Yongdeng County, which has a long history, is the gateway of the Hexi Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 永登縣歷史悠久，是通往河西走廊的門戶。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism Tangka art has a long history and superb techniques.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教的唐卡藝術歷史悠久，技藝精湛。

sentences.english: The exploitation of natural gas and gas water in Sichuan Basin has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地天然氣和氣田水開發歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Wunquan town of Kaixian county has a long history of well salt production.
sentences.chinese: 開縣溫泉鎮井鹽生產歷史悠久，源遠流長。

sentences.english: The town featured a rich history, and was well-known for its culture and traditions along its canals.
sentences.chinese: 青浦歷史悠久，以運河文化和傳統聞名。

sentences.english: Yichang has a long history, the Warring States period Chu Cisse.
sentences.chinese: 宜昌歷史悠久，春秋戰國時期爲楚西塞。

sentences.english: Laohekou has a long history and a splendid culture .
sentences.chinese: 老河口歷史悠久，文化燦爛。

sentences.english: Taizhou has a long history, the Neolithic Age to the birth of human civilization under the Tang.
sentences.chinese: 台州歷史悠久，新石器時代就誕生下湯人類文明。

sentences.english: Tangyuan has a long history in the hot spring development and utilization.
sentences.chinese: 湯院溫泉開發利用歷史悠久。

sentences.english: We were the first, in this ancient island, to draw the sword against tyranny.
sentences.chinese: 在這個歷史悠久的島上，我們首先拔劍反抗暴政。

sentences.english: Condé said that the Guinea-China friendship enjoys a time-honored history.
sentences.chinese: 貢代說，幾中友誼歷史悠久。

definition: shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
to offer (goods or services)/to open (for business etc)
(military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)
